Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back QUEENSLAND ROAD TRIP View gallery / Back Byfield Rainforest Great Keppel Island Hideaway - beach 4 Byfield Rainforest walk Great Keppel Island Hideaway beach Yeppoon Lagoon sunset Great Keppel Island Reef Capricorn Coast Aerial Castle Rock Great Keppel Island - watersports 2 Vue wine bar Castle Rock Farm Capricorn Coast Capricorn Coast: Adventure by the Sea - Suggested Itinerary 7 night itinerary • Self drive • Sightseeing Overview Discover the perfect blend of adventure and tranquility along Queensland’s Capricorn Coast. Snorkel and explore the pristine beaches of Great Keppel Island, soak up the laid-back charm of Yeppoon’s coastal cafés and art scene, then retreat to the peaceful surrounds of Castle Rock Farm for a rustic countryside stay. Whether you're chasing reef adventures or quiet moments in nature, the Capricorn Coast has it all. View more View less 7 night suggested self-drive & sightseeing activities QUEENSLAND ROAD TRIP Enquire now SUGGESTED ITINERARY Day 1: Arrive Rockhampton to Great Keppel Island Arrive at Rockhampton Airport and pick up your rental car. Head directly to Keppel Bay Marina for lunch before boarding your ferry to Great Keppel Island. Check into your beachfront accommodation at Great Keppel Island Hideaway, then enjoy a leisurely dinner at the Hideaway Bistro and relax under the stars. Day 2: Great Keppel Island Spend the day discovering the island’s vibrant reef, swimming, snorkeling, or setting off on an adventure with a paddleboard. You can also book a glass-bottom boat or lunch cruise, or simply unwind on the beach. Take a hike along one of the island’s scenic trails, or relax by the beachfront – be sure to pick up a detailed trail map at reception. For those seeking more excitement, book a scuba dive or a private beach drop-off. Enhance your evening with a sunset cruise for a memorable experience. Overnight at Great Keppel Island Hideaway. Day 3: Great Keppel Island to Yeppoon Catch the morning ferry back to the mainland. Stop by Emu Park’s ANZAC Memorial and Singing Ship before continuing on to Yeppoon. Check into your accommodation and explore the local boutiques, cafés, and Yeppoon Lagoon. For dinner, we recommend Vue Yeppoon. Day 4: Yeppoon Head to Cooberrie Park Wildlife Sanctuary to cuddle a koala and hand-feed kangaroos, or catch a glimpse of a turtle at Turtle Lookout along the Bluff Point Circuit in the Capricorn Coast National Park. In the afternoon, enjoy some free time exploring the Taste Capricorn Coast food trail, tasting local produce at one of the participating restaurants and cafés. Day 5 : Yepoon Head to the Capricorn Caves for the 10 AM Cathedral Cave Tour, then enjoy lunch at The Caves Country Pub. Take a scenic drive back to Yeppoon for your final night and indulge in a sunset dinner at Vue Yeppoon. Day 6: Yepoon to Byfield Rainforest Head to Byfield Rainforest and check in at Castle Rock Farm. We recommend stopping in Yeppoon to pick up supplies for your 2 night stay. Enjoy a guided buggy tour, taking in the stunning views of the surrounding rainforest and Byfield State Forest. Wrap up the day with a relaxing campfire dinner under the stars. Day 7: Byfield Rainforest Spend the day discovering Byfield’s walking trails and take a scenic hike along the Bowenia Rainforest Circuit. Enjoy lunch at the Byfield General Store before returning to Castle Rock Farm for a relaxing evening. Day 8: Byfield Rainforest to Rockhampton Depart for Rockhampton Airport. Great Keppel Island lets you enjoy the best of both worlds - tropical relaxation and adventure. The island offers stunning white sand, crystal-clear waters, and uncrowded shores - pure paradise! Castle Rock farm borders the stunning Byfield National Park, offering guests easy access to lush rainforests, scenic walking trails, and diverse wildlife. Discover the ancient limestone Capricorn Caves which offer an unforgettable experience filled with history, adventure, and breathtaking formations. Turtle Lookout provides great opportunities for spotting marine life, particularly sea turtles in the waters below. The lookout also offers panoramic views over the Keppel Islands, Byfield Ranges, and the blue waters of the Coral Sea. Our favourite places to stay: Great Keppel Island Hideaway Oshen Apartments Yeppoon Salt Beachfront Apartments, Yeppoon Castle Rock Farm, Byfield Choosing your Rental Car Take into consideration the size of the vehicle you require. We recommend a minimum of a medium sized SUV for two adults. This will give you space and freedom when you're travelling. Book your car with House of Travel before leaving home as this will save money and ensure you get the car of your choice.
